question: Which state government has launched Mukhyamantri Septic Tank Safai Yojana?
explanation: Delhi Chief Minister Arvind Kejriwal has launched a scheme â€” Mukhyamantri Septic Tank Safai Yojana - to help people in waste management and to ensure the safety of sanitation workers. The government has plans to achieve three objectives with the scheme viz. a collection of waste from septic tanks in the colonies, ensuring safe disposal of the waste in sewage treatment plants, and deployment of trained staff with safety equipment for cleaning septic tanks.
